verses.verse: In the beginning <S%G746><s%> was the Word, <S%G3056><s%> and the Word <S%G3056><s%> was with God, <S%G2316><s%> and the Word <S%G3056><s%> was God. <S%G2316><s%>
He was in the beginning <S%G746><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> into being <S%G1096><s%> by Him, and apart <S%G5565><s%> from Him nothing <S%G3761><s%> <S%G1520><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> into being <S%G1096><s%> that has come <S%G1096><s%> into being. <S%G1096><s%>
In Him was life, <S%G2222><s%> and the life <S%G2222><s%> was the light <S%G5457><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And the light <S%G5457><s%> shines <S%G5316><s%> in the darkness, <S%G4653><s%> and the darkness <S%G4653><s%> did not comprehend <S%G2638><s%> it.
There came <S%G1096><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> from God, <S%G2316><s%> whose <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was John. <S%G2491><s%>

He came <S%G2064><s%> for a witness, <S%G3141><s%> that he might bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of the light, <S%G5457><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> might believe <S%G4100><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him.
He was not the light, <S%G5457><s%> but [came] that he might bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of the light. <S%G5457><s%>
There was the true <S%G228><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> which, <S%G3739><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> into the world, <S%G2889><s%> enlightens <S%G5461><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>
He was in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and the world <S%G2889><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Him, and the world <S%G2889><s%> did not know <S%G1097><s%> Him.
He came <S%G2064><s%> to His own, <S%G2398><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who were His own <S%G2398><s%> did not receive <S%G3880><s%> Him.

But as many <S%G3745><s%> as received <S%G2983><s%> Him, to them He gave <S%G1325><s%> the right <S%G1849><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> [even] to those <S%G3588><s%> who believe <S%G4100><s%> in His name, <S%G3686><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> were born <S%G1080><s%> not of blood, <S%G129><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of the will <S%G2307><s%> of the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of the will <S%G2307><s%> of man, <S%G435><s%> but of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the Word <S%G3056><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and dwelt <S%G4637><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> us, and we beheld <S%G2300><s%> His glory, <S%G1391><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> as of the only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> from the Father, <S%G3962><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of grace <S%G5485><s%> and truth. <S%G225><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> bore <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Him, and cried <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> was He of whom <S%G3739><s%> I said, <S%G3004><s%> 'He who comes <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me has <S%G1096><s%> a higher <S%G1715><s%> rank <S%G1715><s%> than I, for He existed <S%G1510><s%> before <S%G4413><s%> me.'"
For of His fulness <S%G4138><s%> we have all <S%G3956><s%> received, <S%G2983><s%> and grace <S%G5485><s%> upon grace. <S%G5485><s%>

For the Law <S%G3551><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Moses; <S%G3475><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> and truth <S%G225><s%> were realized <S%G1096><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> has seen <S%G3708><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> at any <S%G4455><s%> time; <S%G4455><s%> the only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who is in the bosom <S%G2859><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> He has explained <S%G1834><s%> [Him.]

And this <S%G3778><s%> is the witness <S%G3141><s%> of John, <S%G2491><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> to him priests <S%G2409><s%> and Levites <S%G3019><s%> from Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to ask <S%G2065><s%> him, "Who <S%G5101><s%> are you?"
And he confessed, <S%G3670><s%> and did not deny, <S%G720><s%> and he confessed, <S%G3670><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> not the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>"

And they asked <S%G2065><s%> him, "What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? Are you Elijah <S%G2243><s%>?" And he said, <S%G3004><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> not." "Are you the Prophet <S%G4396><s%>?" And he answered, <S%G611><s%> "No. <S%G3756><s%>"

They said <S%G3004><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> to him, "Who <S%G5101><s%> are you, so <S%G2443><s%> that we may give <S%G1325><s%> an answer <S%G612><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who sent <S%G3992><s%> us? What <S%G5101><s%> do you say <S%G3004><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%>?"

He said, <S%G5346><s%> "I am a voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> 'Make <S%G2116><s%> straight <S%G2116><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%>' as Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> said. <S%G3004><s%>"
Now <S%G2532><s%> they had been <S%G1510><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> from the Pharisees. <S%G5330><s%>

And they asked <S%G2065><s%> him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Why <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> are you baptizing, <S%G907><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you are not the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> Elijah, <S%G2243><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> the Prophet <S%G4396><s%>?"

John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I baptize <S%G907><s%> in water, <S%G5204><s%> [but] among <S%G3319><s%> you stands <S%G4739><s%> One whom <S%G3739><s%> you do not know. <S%G3609><s%>
"[It is] He who comes <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, the thong <S%G2438><s%> of whose <S%G3739><s%> sandal <S%G5266><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not worthy <S%G514><s%> to untie. <S%G3089><s%>"

These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> took <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> in Bethany <S%G963><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was baptizing. <S%G907><s%>

The next <S%G1887><s%> day <S%G1887><s%> he saw <S%G991><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> to him, and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G2396><s%> the Lamb <S%G286><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> who takes <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> the sin <S%G266><s%> of the world! <S%G2889><s%>

"This <S%G3778><s%> is He on behalf <S%G5228><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> I said, <S%G3004><s%> 'After <S%G3694><s%> me comes <S%G2064><s%> a Man <S%G435><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> has <S%G1096><s%> a higher <S%G1715><s%> rank <S%G1715><s%> than I, for He existed <S%G1510><s%> before <S%G4413><s%> me.'

"And I did not recognize <S%G3609><s%> Him, but in order <S%G2443><s%> that He might be manifested <S%G5319><s%> to Israel, <S%G2474><s%> I came <S%G2064><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> in water. <S%G5204><s%>"

And John <S%G2491><s%> bore <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I have beheld <S%G2300><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> as a dove <S%G4058><s%> out of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and He remained <S%G3306><s%> upon Him.

"And I did not recognize <S%G3609><s%> Him, but He who sent <S%G3992><s%> me to baptize <S%G907><s%> in water <S%G5204><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to me, 'He upon whom <S%G3739><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> and remaining <S%G3306><s%> upon Him, this <S%G3778><s%> is the one who baptizes <S%G907><s%> in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>'
"And I have seen, <S%G3708><s%> and have borne <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"
Again <S%G3825><s%> the next <S%G1887><s%> day <S%G1887><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> with two <S%G1417><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%>
and he looked <S%G1689><s%> upon Jesus <S%G2424><s%> as He walked, <S%G4043><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G2396><s%> the Lamb <S%G286><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"
And the two <S%G1417><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> him speak, <S%G2980><s%> and they followed <S%G190><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> turned, <S%G4762><s%> and beheld <S%G2300><s%> them following, <S%G190><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "What <S%G5101><s%> do you seek <S%G2212><s%>?" And they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Rabbi <S%G4461><s%> (which <S%G3739><s%> translated <S%G3177><s%> means <S%G3004><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%>), where <S%G4226><s%> are You staying <S%G3306><s%>?"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Come, <S%G2064><s%> and you will see. <S%G3708><s%>" They came <S%G2064><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> and saw <S%G3708><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> He was staying; <S%G3306><s%> and they stayed <S%G3306><s%> with Him that day, <S%G2250><s%> for it was about <S%G5613><s%> the tenth <S%G1182><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>
One <S%G1520><s%> of the two <S%G1417><s%> who heard <S%G191><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> [speak,] and followed <S%G190><s%> Him, was Andrew, <S%G406><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter's brother. <S%G80><s%>

He found <S%G2147><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "We have found <S%G2147><s%> the Messiah <S%G3323><s%>" (which <S%G3739><s%> translated <S%G3177><s%> means <S%G1510><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>).

He brought <S%G71><s%> him to Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> looked <S%G1689><s%> at him, and said, <S%G3004><s%> "You are Simon <S%G4613><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of John; <S%G2491><s%> you shall be called <S%G2564><s%> Cephas <S%G2786><s%>" (which <S%G3739><s%> is translated <S%G2059><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>).

The next <S%G1887><s%> day <S%G1887><s%> He purposed <S%G2309><s%> to go <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> into Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and He found <S%G2147><s%> Philip. <S%G5376><s%> And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Follow <S%G190><s%> Me."
Now <S%G1161><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> was from Bethsaida, <S%G966><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> of Andrew <S%G406><s%> and Peter. <S%G4074><s%>

Philip <S%G5376><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "We have found <S%G2147><s%> Him of whom <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> in the Law <S%G3551><s%> and [also] the Prophets <S%G4396><s%> wrote, <S%G1125><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph. <S%G2501><s%>"

And Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Can <S%G1410><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing <S%G18><s%> come <S%G1510><s%> out of Nazareth <S%G3478><s%>?" Philip <S%G5376><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Come <S%G2064><s%> and see. <S%G3708><s%> "

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> to Him, and said <S%G3004><s%> of him, "Behold, <S%G2396><s%> an Israelite <S%G2475><s%> indeed, <S%G230><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> is no <S%G3756><s%> guile! <S%G1388><s%>"

Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "How <S%G4159><s%> do You know <S%G1097><s%> me?" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Before <S%G4253><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> you, when you were under <S%G5259><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree, <S%G4808><s%> I saw <S%G3708><s%> you."
Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Him, "Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> You are the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> You are the King <S%G935><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Because <S%G3754><s%> I said <S%G3004><s%> to you that I saw <S%G3708><s%> you under <S%G5270><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree, <S%G4808><s%> do you believe <S%G4100><s%>? You shall see <S%G3708><s%> greater <S%G3173><s%> things <S%G3173><s%> than these. <S%G3778><s%>"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, you shall see <S%G3708><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> opened, <S%G455><s%> and the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> ascending <S%G305><s%> and descending <S%G2597><s%> on the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man. <S%G444><s%>"
